system.file

Class LVSFileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.model.LVSObject
      • system.model.LVSHandler
        • system.file.LVSFileHandler

  • public class LVSFileHandler
extends LVSHandler
    This class is File Handler which handles all the operation working with LVSFile, for instance, import, save and update.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
